info.name: Mustakbaly API - Learning & Reporting
info.description:
**Learning Module** and **Reporting Module** API collection.

- **Grouped by role**: Super Admin, Manager, Instructor, Student, Donor.
- **Reporting Module** in a separate top-level folder.
- All authenticated routes use JWT: set `token` (from login) in collection/environment variables.
- Set `base_url` (e.g. http://localhost:8000) and role-specific variables (`organization`, `program`, `course`, etc.) as needed.

item.name: Learning Module
item.description: Learning Module routes grouped by user role. Requires JWT and role middleware.

request.description: Paginated list of all learning programs.
Check if course can be published.
Check if unit can be deleted.

item.name: Reporting Module
item.description: Reporting Module routes: dashboards and reports. Base path: /api/v1. Use JWT where required by your app.

item.name: Dashboards
item.description: Dashboard endpoints from ReportingModule (dashboards.php). Set learnerId, instructorId, donorId, organizationId as needed.
